body:
### Welcome to EBRL's Github

This page serves as a landing page for all of EBRL's github repositories.

#### Notebooks
- [ADHD][adhd-nb]. This notebook details the logic for determining ADHD diagnoses in the LERD P1, NF and RCV projects and contains code to implement it.
- [LERD P2 Year Calculations][lerdp2_year-nb]. This notebook implements logic for grabbing screening dates from the LERD P2 Screening DDE Redcap and determining whether the subject is from "year 1" or "year 2".

#### Apps/scripts/etc.

To be continuedâ€¦

#### Authors and Contributors
@sburns drives most of the code projects for EBRL.

[adhd-nb]: http://nbviewer.ipython.org/urls/raw.github.com/EBRL/adhd/master/adhd.ipynb
[lerdp2_year-nb]: http://nbviewer.ipython.org/urls/raw.github.com/EBRL/lerdp2_screening_calc/master/date_calc.ipynb
name: EBRL @ Github
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
